resources.string: A day and a life of Tony Tran. Eat applesauce every hour on the hour. Diet consist of nothing but apple sauce. but he can not afford applesauce, which is a problem cause he will starve. what will he do to get his applesauce fix? Will he resort to a life of crime? or will he get a normal 9â€“5 job? No one knows how his life will turn out, niot even himself. will he make something of him self or will he let everyone in his life down?
